name: FILEDIA
desc: Suppresses display of file navigation dialog boxes..

options.desc: Does not display dialog boxes. You can still request a file dialog box to appear by entering a tilde (~) in response to the Command prompt.
Displays dialog boxes. However, if a script is active, an ordinary prompt is displayed. Prompts are also displayed if an AutoLISP or ObjectARXâ„¢ program is active. (Not applicable to AutoCAD LT.)

name: _VERNUM
desc: Returns the product's build version number.

name: ANNOAUTOSCALE
desc: Updates annotative objects to support the annotation scale when the annotation scale is changed.

options.desc: Newly set annotation scale is not added to annotative objects.
Adds the newly set annotation scale to annotative objects that support the current scale except for those on layers that are turned off, frozen, locked or that are set to Viewport > Freeze
Adds the newly set annotation scale to annotative objects that support the current scale except for those on layers that are turned off, frozen, or that are set to Viewport > Freeze.
Adds the newly set annotation scale to annotative objects that support the current scale except for those on layers that are locked.
Adds the newly set annotation scale to all annotative objects that support the current scale.

name: CTAB
desc: Determines whether the drawing area displays the Model tab or a specified layout tab.

name: 3DCONVERSIONMODE
desc: Used to convert material and light definitions to the current product release.

options.desc: No material or lighting conversion takes place when the drawing is opened
Material and lighting conversion takes place automatically
You are prompted to convert any materials or lighting

name: 3DDWFPREC
desc: Controls the precision of 3D DWF or 3D DWFx publishing.
